bibl.title: Urban Shrine and Rural Saint in Fifth-Century Alexandria.
bibl.note: Originally delivered at the International Medieval Conference, Leeds, July 1999. - I. Relics and Politics. - II. John the Little and the Shrine of the Three Hebrews. - III. Macarius of Tkow and the Shrine of John and Elisha. - IV. Conclusion: Hermits and the Legitimation of Scriptural Saints.

bibl.title: Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods

bibl.seg: FRANKFURTER David, Urban Shrine and Rural Saint in Fifth-Century Alexandria.
Jas ELSNER and Ian RUTHERFORD (Edd.), Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods (Oxford, 2005) pp. 435-449.

Originally delivered at the International Medieval Conference, Leeds, July 1999. - I. Relics and Politics. - II. John the Little and the Shrine of the Three Hebrews. - III. Macarius of Tkow and the Shrine of John and Elisha. - IV. Conclusion: Hermits and the Legitimation of Scriptural Saints.
